title: Vill i hjertet
overview: The fairytale girl Tonje Blomseth embarks on the most difficult project of her life when she and her boyfriend Per Anders will live a whole year far out in the wilderness of Canada. Many miles from the nearest civilization, they face great challenges every day. With six dogs that also need theirs, and with temperatures down to minus 40 degrees, it will be a hard fight against nature. Do they have the strength to complete the project, and how is the relationship going along the way?
